column1: | Trains from the West via the Through Road, planned to stop in Platform 12CD must not exceed 2x3 car class       |
| LNER services not to be planned in Platforms 15 and 16 as services exceed platform length                       |
| Trains required to stand on through-platforms for longer than 45 minutes to be discussed with and agreed by     |
| LNER Class 80x units that are required to attach or detach should not be planned into Platform 9                |
| Northern and LNER require a 10 min journey time from Neville Hill TMD to Leeds. This can be applied as          |
| additional adjustment time before Neville Hill West Junction.                                                   |
| When a train is showing as occupying Platform 1 or 1a, then the non-preferred route for arrival into Platform 2 |
